title: Creating a Service in CloudForms for Virtual Machine Provisioning
subtitle: How to create a service in Red Hat CloudForms for provisioning a Red Hat Virtualization virtual machine

abstract.para: This workflow example demonstrates how to create a service in Red Hat CloudForms for virtual machine provisioning using the Self Service user interface.

If you have a suggestion for improving this guide or have found an error, please submit a Bugzilla report at http://bugzilla.redhat.com against Red Hat CloudForms Management Engine for the Documentation component. Please provide specific details, such as the section number, guide name, and CloudForms version so we can easily locate the content.
